name: Travis
placeOfBirth: East James, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S)
description: Travis is a amber-eyed llama with brown hair, standing 174 cm tall. Originally from East James, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S), Travis enjoys hiking, wood carving, gardening. Known for their playful and mischievous personality, Travis is a beloved member of the llama community.
